chart_description: The I/O full pressure of the system measures the percentage of time that a process must wait for disk I/O as all available I/O operations are being used. High values may indicate that the system is experiencing I/O bottlenecks.

dimension_descriptions.full 10: The percentage of time that a process must wait for disk I/O when the disk is at 10 percent full.
dimension_descriptions.full 300: The percentage of time that a process must wait for disk I/O when the disk is at 300 percent full.
dimension_descriptions.full 60: The percentage of time that a process must wait for disk I/O when the disk is at 60 percent full.
